duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and maintain machinery to produce high-quality products according to specifications.
Conduct regular quality control checks to ensure product meets safety and production standards.
Perform routine maintenance on equipment to prevent downtime and maintain efficiency.
Adhere to strict safety procedures and guidelines to minimize workplace hazards.
Demonstrate attention to detail and precision in all aspects of machine operations.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Technical certification preferred)
